statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND details->'severity' = 'high';
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_actions > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE action IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activities_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activities_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_details FROM user_activities_audit_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Login';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activities_audit_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activities_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_type, activity_details FROM user_activities_audit_logs WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM user_activities_audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 10 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, r.role_name FROM user_roles r INNER JOIN user_activities_audit_logs u ON r.role_id = u.user_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT MAX(log_id) AS max_log_id FROM user_activities_audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, activity_type FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT details, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'john_d%';
SELECT policy_name, description FROM audit_policies ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, policy_name FROM user_accounts JOIN audit_policies ON user_accounts.user_id = audit_policies.created_by WHERE user_accounts.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, created_at FROM audit_logs WHERE DATE(timestamp) = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM audit_policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_level FROM security_regulations WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM audit_policies WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_level FROM security_regulations WHERE compliance_level IN ('high', 'medium');
SELECT * FROM user_profile ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, full_name FROM user_profile WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT DISTINCT regulation_name FROM compliance_regulation;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'LOGIN';
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, full_name FROM user_profile WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM security_policy WHERE policy_name LIKE '%authentication%' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM compliance_regulation WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
